short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check for whois and server information of a domain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For the given domain, check the domain information like when it was created, when it will expire, last updated date, nameservers, registrar information and server information such as IP address, ISP, location and time zone and much more information.
